query: Recommend to user 432 some movies where the main character is kidnapped.

tool_plan.note: To get the IDs of movies with a storyline where the main character is kidnapped.
To get a personalized ranking of movies where the main character is kidnapped for the user.
To get useful information to list the recommended items. 'title', 'genres', and 'description' should be retrieved.

arguments.items: <String containing the file path returned by the item_filter_tool>
<Python list of item IDs returned by get_top_k_recommendations_tool>
